resources.string: Total Tank Loads Needed for Project
Calculations will automatically be saved into history. Project name will not be displayed in the output, but will be displayed in the history output.
OpenWeatherMap is the API source of the weather updates. The weather output displays a minute by minute forecast.
There is no limit to the amount of saved calculations. The saved data can be shared through email, text, and Google Drive. History can be deleted by clearing app cache in the phone memory settings
